experience.title: Arabic Linguist & Cultural Advisor
description: Provided translation, transcription, and cultural expertise in support of military operations.
Supported intelligence missions through language interpretation and cross-cultural communication.
Operated in high-pressure environments with strict security protocols.

experience.title: Patient Access Case Manager / Pharmaceutical Liaison
description: Coordinated patient access to specialty medications, working with insurance providers, physicians, and pharmacies.
Specialized in regulatory compliance, case management, and healthcare communication.
Supported cross-functional healthcare teams with data and documentation.

experience.title: Software Engineer Apprentice
description: Built and deployed front-end and back-end projects, including interactive sites and API-based tools.
Gained hands-on experience in JavaScript, React, HTML/CSS, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Worked on team projects using Agile and Scrum methodologies.

experience.title: Certified Scrum Product Owner & Scrum Master, Google Project Management
description: Applied Agile principles to manage sprints and backlogs.
Led user research and MVP planning for product and portfolio projects.

details: Conducting hands-on labs in vulnerability assessment, Nmap scanning, and Windows security hardening.
Collaborating on capstone projects blending healthcare, product management, and cybersecurity principles.
Building a portfolio of simulations and educational tools.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Healthcare Administration
details: Focused on healthcare systems, regulatory policies, and patient services.
Developed foundational knowledge in healthcare operations that supported later roles in patient access and pharmaceutical liaison.
